descriptions: A large hall with cold stone walls.
A grand entrance echoing with silence.
A narrow corridor lit by flickering torches.
A long stone passageway.
Broken weapons lie scattered across the floor.
An armory long since looted.
Dusty books line the walls.
Shelves filled with ancient tomes.
A quiet shrine glowing faintly.
An altar stands at the center of the room.
A damp cellar with a low ceiling.
The smell of mold fills the air.
Stone coffins line the walls.
A cold silence fills the crypt.
A wide hall with a collapsed roof.
Long tables stand covered in dust.
Crates and barrels fill the room.
A room once used for storing supplies.
Rusty bars block the exits.
A cold cell with chains on the walls.
A circular room high above the ground.
Wind whistles through broken windows.
Plants have reclaimed this space.
A silent garden bathed in moonlight.
Tools lie scattered on old tables.
A workshop left in haste.
A secluded chamber hidden from sight.
The walls here are carved with symbols.
Rough stone walls surround you.
Water drips from the ceiling.
A narrow bridge spans a deep chasm.
Parts of the bridge have collapsed.
A heavy door guards this room.
The air feels heavy with secrets.
A powerful presence can be felt here.
The room hums with energy.
A short hallway branching off.
Footsteps echo softly here.
A shattered throne stands at the far end.
Once a place of power, now in ruin.
